content:
Sure, here's a tweet table for Alfred Hitchcock's movies 1-5:

| # | Title | Thematic Focus & Question | Hashtags |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Blackmail | What happens when a person tries to hide their guilt, and how does it affect those around them? | #Blackmail #Hitchcock #Guilt #Consequences |
| 2 | The Man Who Knew Too Much (1934) | How far would you go to protect your family? | #TheManWhoKnewTooMuch #Hitchcock #Family #Thriller |
| 3 | The 39 Steps | Can an ordinary person become a hero in the face of danger, and what motivates them to do so? | #The39Steps #Hitchcock #Adventure #Heroism |
| 4 | The Lady Vanishes | How well do we really know the people we travel with, and what secrets could they be hiding? | #TheLadyVanishes #Hitchcock #Mystery #Suspense |
| 5 | Rebecca | What effect does a powerful, mysterious woman have on those around her, and how far will they go for her? | #Rebecca #Hitchcock #PsychologicalThriller #Mystery |
